titles.title: TEFAP State Partnership Act of 1996
To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to purchase commodities under the Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 using State funds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 8/2/1996--Introduced. TEFAP State Partnership Act of 1996 - Amends the Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to use State funds to purchase and process commodities under such Act.
